text: @chuckwoolery You lied about COVID19. Now you’re embarrassed & terrified because you’re kid has it. You fucked yourself over, and a lot of idiots didn’t take this virus seriously because of your lie. Hope your kid makes it and maybe you get your head out of Trump’s ass, as an added bonus.
